case.state: Today's a very special day! It's Kazuki Takahashi's birthday! He was a good friend to all of us in the Dueling world.
Hey! I remember you from the costume duel!
I see you've played with Fina before.
Hello, everyone! Ready for another fun Summer day?
Hi, everyone!
It's time to d-d-d-d...hehe, just kidding!
It's Duel Monsters' Spirit Day! I won't let it go to waste!
Hey! I remember you from the costume duel!
~Kindred~'s a spirit like me! This is going to be fun!
Ooh! Another Spellcaster is here too! We're going to have so much fun together!
Our tales, our trials, and our triumphs wouldn't even be possible without Mr. Takahashi. So to him, I would like to say thank you. For everything.
It feels a little empty in here.
Where is everyone else?
You know this is more fun with more people, right?
We have Mari and... Mari? Is that 2 Maris? 2 Marii?
Your robot friend is leaving? Aww...
Alright, Chazz! You might be good at Duel Monsters but how are you in poker?
I was hoping to rematch Jaden or play with Syrus, but I think you'll do just fine!
Oh wow, it's Pot of Greed! You're, uh, bigger than I expected.
Wow! And I thought Yugi had big hair!
Happy birthday! I love parties!
Why are we in a classroom? Is someone going to make us study? I came here to relax and have fun, not sit through some boring lesson!
This is the perfect place to play! It's relaxing, and nobody will get cold after they strip!
If we're playing in someone's room then that means we can stay together tonight, right?
Inviting us to your room for strip poker, ~player~? Aren't you a naughty ~player.ifMale(boy|girl)~?
This place looks cute! Dibs on cuddling with the plushie!
We have backup cards in case things get wet, right? What? What did I say?
Why are we here? This place is dirty and disgusting, and I don't even want to know what that weird puddle is!
Interesting choice of books for a library. "On the Origin of Species." "A Brief History of Time." Where are all the books on magic?
You didn't bring me here to make me study from all these books, did you? I just wanted to have fun tonight!
Wow! This place is fancy! Stained glass is always a nice touch!
Is that a gun?
Ah! Please don't shoot!
What's with the armor? Aren't we just here to play a card game?
I'm ready to play!
An adults' card game? Let's play!
I love card games, especially when they're fun for the loser too!
Normally it takes 1 tribute to summon me. Maybe you should tribute a piece of clothing.
It may not be Duel Monsters, but this looks fun too!
Good luck, everyone!
Hi...your name's ~player~, right? Nice to meet you.
I draw ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should do the trick!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should be all I need.
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will definitely be enough to win!
I use Magical Mallet and trade in ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
I'll draw ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please!
Umm... How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I hope ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will be enough.
How many should I swap out? Better make it ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Drawing ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...
I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hopefully ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will do the trick...
Yeah, Corrin! You should always believe in the heart of the cards!
Trust in the heart of the cards, Corrin!
The heart of the cards will guide you!
Trust in the heart of the cards! That's what I do!
So, Hermione, can you defend against my Dark Magic?
No... way... You all aren't going to believe this! I HAVE A ROYAL FLUSH!
I can already hear victory calling my name!
Ha! These cards will send all your cards to the Graveyard!
These cards may as well be all 5 pieces of Exodia! You should all just give up now!
There's no way I can lose with this hand!
It must be my lucky day!
Looks like my next trick will be making your clothes disappear!
A perfect hand! No mulligans needed!
Just what I needed! And that's pretty rare in my deck!
ATK increased by 300!
Alright! Even without my pendant my luck is still going strong!
Yeah! No way I'm losing this hand!
The heart of the cards pulls through!
Magicians are the best at card tricks!
This hand is perfect!
And this is the hand that will turn my luck around!
Don't count me out yet!
Yes! This hand is just what I needed!
Yay! This hand is awesome!
This hand's so good you should all strip after this round!
And I was worried I'd start doing worse!
Time to turn this around!
The perfect top hand!
Yeah, Corrin! You should always believe in the heart of the cards!
Trust in the heart of the cards, Corrin!
The heart of the cards will guide you!
Trust in the heart of the cards! That's what I do!
So, Hermione, can you defend against my Dark Magic?
Will this be enough?
I hope this hand is good enough.
I'm not certain about these cards. I might lose again!
Oh no, this isn't looking good!
Don't freak out... You've got this...
Just keep calm. These cards will work out.
This is fine. I believe in the heart of the cards!
These aren't bad, but aren't quite the cards I needed.
Umm... Can I set 1 or 2 cards face-down and activate them later? No? Okay.
Part of being a duelist is knowing how to work with less-than-ideal hands.
I've lost with better hands before! This could be trouble!
I won't back down now!
I'll never give up!
This hand has the same 50/50 odds as Time Wizard, and it's either going to go great or blow up in my face.
I think I can win... No, I know I can win!
Naturally, I can do all kinds of card tricks! Making this hand work is probably one of them.
I guess I can work with this.
Hmm... Maybe I should have swapped out that other card instead?
This hand can still win! I just have to trust in the heart of the cards!
That's not the draw I was hoping for!
Will I be able to win with this hand?
This hand is cutting it close! But someone else must have worse, right?
I think I just felt my Attack Points drop on this one.
I should just send this whole hand to the Graveyard right now.
Oh no! Please tell me someone's cards are worse!
You, uh... you all don't have any good cards either, right?
Wow... These cards are terrible.
What would my master do in times like this?
Oh no, I'm going to lose this round!
How can I win with a hand like this?
Haha...I wish I had Kuriboh in my hand now.
I did accidentally hit my head with the spell once. I was bald for a month! That's when I started wearing my hat all the time.
I need an Equip Spell to help me out here.
I wish I had Reload so I could shuffle these cards back and draw new ones.
My master never likes leaving things to chance. Getting a hand like this makes me understand why.
Oh no... Mid-round trade, anyone?
My heart just sank a little.
Did someone use a Trap Card on me?
Magic could change this hand...but that wouldn't be fair.
Aww... I shouldn't have taken off my lucky pendant.
I think I just felt my Attack Points drop on this one.
I should just send this whole hand to the Graveyard right now.
Oh no! Please tell me someone's cards are worse!
You, uh... you all don't have any good cards either, right?
Wow... These cards are terrible.
What would my master do in times like this?
Oh no, I'm going to lose this round!
How can I win with a hand like this?
Haha...I wish I had Kuriboh in my hand now.
This is the worst...
*sigh* It just keeps getting worse.
Oh no! With this hand I'll have to...
Not good, not good, not good!
Why me?
Guess I'm going to lose this round.
This is a nightmare!
Uh oh...
Can I get a Red Medicine in a Cup of Ace please?
Only if mine comes in a Pot of Greed!
If your limbs come off too, and I put all five pieces back together, do I automatically win?
Why is there a number one on your jacket? Did you win it as a first-place prize for something?
You see by feeling? Are you super sensitive?
Really? I think we'd all like to see your pair.
I think you need a better nickname. "The Chazz" doesn't mean much when there aren't many people named Chazz anyway.
What made you choose cards as your weapon?
Most people wouldn't use cards as their weapons. What made you decide on them?
Another card player, I see! Which game do you prefer?
A cowboy with cards instead of guns. Now this is the way to a woman's heart.
Ugh! Is someone smoking? I can smell it from here!
Who's smoking in here? I hate that smell!
What's that disgusting smell! Someone is smoking in here!
My deck has my friends, my students, and of course myself!
Weren't you in Slifer too?
I don't think you should make fun of your fellow Slifers, Chazz.
Family? My Master's the closest I have to a father and I guess my own students are like sisters to me. They're all extremely important to me.
Aren't there laws against putting a school on a volcano? It's like it was built by someone who goes through life saying "screw the rules!"
I'll show you I'm no novice!
That would be Swords of Concealing Light, and no that won't work since you got the name wrong.
Wikipe-tan, you know all sorts of things. How do you remember it all?
How do you know so much, Wikipe-tan? Do you have access to a magical library?
You can call me DMG instead. Mana is someone else. It's a bit complicated.
They're actually little demons, but at least the one I know is a loveable little fur ball. I'm sure Cupil and Kuriboh would get along great!
Was that a fire spell I just saw? Is Kumatora a Magician Girl too?
What decks have you tried? Banishing cards from the Graveyard is usually a good idea against Zombies.

condition.saying: One time a whole town confused me with a wizard, because only wizards have stars on their clothes.

case.state: You mean you're not a magic user?
It's believing in both yourself and your deck! Have faith in both, and the cards will work with you to give you what you need!
Did she just switch to Defense Mode? Are we allowed to do that?
That sounds delicious! I want two full plates! No, three!
Hey, Colress! What's that fancy tablet you've got there?
Sounds like you're not exactly the best student either, Yuno. I can relate to that.
Flying is pretty efficient, right?
Wouldn't that cause an accident in one of your cars? You're supposed to be watching the road, right?
I would probably help them, but the way you're acting has me very concerned. Did you agree to do something bad?
What? You mean computers have mice and bugs?
Whoa! Perona, where did that ghost come from?
Why are you looking for servants? Are you a noble of some kind?
Who or what actually is Rausten? Is it a kingdom? Is it a god?
My hat, huh? Do you like my hair that much?
I see. So you have a thing for blondes, do you?
I see. Even with the downside of letting your opponent draw 4 cards, skipping their turn is an incredibly powerful effect. How hard is it to play the card?
I guess I was wrong about who your sister is. But being a firefighter sounds exciting! I bet she's helped a lot of people!
That's amazing! Would I be able to add something too to your articles too?
I mean, I'm sure people have tried. However, usually only a few people are even able to see card spirits so they would just be seeing holograms.
I'm sure they have, but they would only be seeing a hologram of me. Most people can't see card spirits like me.
I live in a beautiful world with several other spirits! There's a huge castle surrounded by open meadows and lush forests!
I come from a world where there are lots of Fairies and other Spellcasters! Even a few cute Beasts and Dragons!
"Heretic Demon," huh? How did you get that interesting nickname?
That explains the wings! And the tail! I have so many questions! What kind of guys do you like to go for? How long can you go without "feeding"? What kinds of people can you get more energy from?
Fifth Crusade? Weren't there only three? Have I just completely missed a part of world history?
Wow, that's so cool! An extra pair of hands is always really helpful! And you can just do that whenever you want? Are there any downsides?
There was one dream I had about a handsome Warrior. We were alone, so he suggested bathing in the river together. We stripped down, and well, I'll let your imagination fill in the rest.
That's the one where you can risk all your money, isn't it? Are you the kind of guy that loves to risk everything?
Face-down is good, but I like being able to see everything too!
You... drink all that stuff? What are you?
You can show me your physical prowess if you want.

Favorite? Good question. I think I like riding on top the best! Sometimes I like to levitate us while they're too into it to notice, then when they realize it they hold me close in panic, and I kiss them and tell them it's alright.
You sleep in your hat? Does it also work as a pillow or something?
Why are you thinking about making weapons out of swimsuits?

condition.saying: okay for me to be feeling a little nervous

case.state: Sweetie, the time to feel nervous was before your chest was on display!
Well if you ever want to sleep together, let me know!
OK, but what if I fly over to you? You can't see me if I don't actually walk on the ground, right?
Wow! That's so cool! What kind of magic did you call this again?
Oh, so you're some kind of righteous freedom fighter? That's cool!
Oh, I'm so sorry! I didn't mean to upset you! I just never met someone like you before. Is there something about succubi that you are okay with talking about?
Well, some people like satin for one and cotton for the other. I just wanted an idea of what it might feel like.
Does the mark do anything special or is it just like a birthmark?
That guy of yours sounds like an interesting character. I'm sure he gets himself into all kinds of trouble talking like that!
It's so cool that you can still see with your power! Is it harder to see on some kinds of dirt than others?
So how big would a rock have to be before you couldn't bend it?
So if someone wanted to blindfold you for a bit, all they would have to do is fly you up into the air? Asking for a friend.
How do succubi usually fight? Do you use magic more often than physical attacks? What about weapons?
I mean, I know I don't get out of the spirit world very often, but I didn't think I was missing that much! Maybe you could lend me a history book after this?

(That sweater and those glasses seem familiar.)
Hey, Heris, do you have any sisters?
Wait, Fluttershy! Are you Number 87: Queen of the Night?
Hey, Lux! You're pretty and good with Light spells. How would you like to become the Light Magician Girl?
Sucrose, you practice bio-alchemy, right? Does your alchemy involve any magic?
If I understand your job correctly, Hu Tao, you help prepare the dead for their burial, right?
Those fries look tasty. Did you bring enough to share?
If you're using portals to get around, you must be a mage too, right?
I've see a lot of different body types and outfits, but I don't think I've ever seen someone wearing a cardboard box before.
So Yuno, can you tell me more about this other card game you play? What's the most powerful card in Uno?
Wow, L'Arachel, you're staff is impressive! Can you cast any magic with it?
You're floating? Are you a spirit too?
So Samus, your bounty hunter job means you track down bad guys, right?
What kind of magic is this "earthbending"? What kind of things do you use it for?
If I win the game, I'm going to sit on the throne and, uh... Make everyone do silly dances!
When I win I'm making everyone sing karaoke, but I pick the songs!
I've got a lot of fun ideas for when I take the title of Queen of Strip Poker!
Let's see... Oh! I could make everyone draw silly pictures, and then we'll hang them in random places throughout this castle and see how long it takes people to notice!
So does the winner get to sit on the throne and order everyone else around?
Did you bring enough food for the rest of the class, ~food~?
Make sure ~cheater~ is taking cards from the deck and not someone else! ~cheater.ifMale(He|She)~ seems to have trouble keeping ~cheater.ifMale(his|her)~ hands to ~cheater.ifMale(himself|herself)~.
~Cutie~, you remind me of this cute guy I met at Duel Academy.
You know, ~Truesdale~, you remind me of someone named Syrus.
Hey, ~quietshy~, why are you keeping to yourself over there?
Could you speak up, ~quietshy~? I couldn't quite catch that.
I heard people where you're from duel with creatures called Pokmon.
I wonder if ~BlueEyes~ belongs to the Eyes of Blue tribe?
I don't understand why idols like ~idol~ aren't usually allowed to have boyfriends. Wouldn't they be able to perform better if they were at their happiest?
A lot of people say they want to put me in face-down position. I'm sure you can see why.
Chazz should have a nickname that's loud like him. Boomer? No, too old-sounding. Oh, how about Thunder?
I heard Pokmon can have 2 types. I don't know how your generic support is balanced and not overpowered.
In response to your Evenly Matched, I play... Oh, you weren't playing the card. My bad.
It's nice to get away from the Spirit World every now and then. I enjoy playing card games with new people and it gives me a chance to meet my adoring fans!
This reminds me of the time I had that cosplay duel with Jaden Yuki. Everyone dressed up like Duel Monsters, and most people thought I was another student at Duel Academy!
All this standing and walking feels a little weird when you're as used to flying around everywhere as I am.
I hope everyone at home is doing alright. Some Monsters just haven't been the same since the Great Leviathan incident.
When I play Duel Monsters I usually use a deck with Spellcasters like me, but I wonder how fun would it be to play something else, like a Warrior or a Dragon deck.
Wait, you're actually using two extra cards? That's cheating!
Wait, what kind of hand does Pot of Greed have? Where is that even supposed to rank?
Most people just call me DMG for short.
I'm clearly not a child. I'm well aware this place isn't 4Kids.
No! Wait! That came out wrong!
That's fine, Fina! I've never heard of a Black Moon Stone but there is the Pitch-Black Power Stone that works as a backup source of energy.
Isn't that exactly what you did before, Chazz? I didn't hear any complaints back then.
Oh, that's a real cute pun, Cynthia. I'll make sure my next trick's on you!
No, Rinkah. We do it all the time!

"Hex Maniac" isn't a name I know, but a lot of Magicians dress alike, so you probably have met someone like us if you recognize the style. Do all Spellcasters where you're from get called things like "Maniac?"
I hope nobody thinks we're maniacs. We Magicians do dress the same, so you're probably right. Do Spellcasters typically have a bad reputation where you're from?
I'm the real Dark Magician Girl, straight from the world of Card Spirits! I didn't know they made actual shows and manga about me, but I do know there's a lot of art and cosplay!
It's amazing! Nothing compares to the excitement and feeling the wind rushing past your face! Yes, I could ride my wand too, but the wand lacks the power and majesty of a dragon companion!
He's stoic, and strict if you're his apprentice, but he's one of the most reliable people I know.
I would love to! It's always a pleasure to meet one of my adoring fans!
That's right! A lot of people are surprised to find out the cards are linked to real spirits, but we're all real and live our own lives in the Spirit World.
Have you ever played Duel Monsters before? I can teach you, if you want. There's a deck for everyone! What's your thing, Yuno? Knights? Dragons? Cute girls?
That's right! Dark Magic is called that because it can cause the user into acting on their darkest desires. My positive personality is why it doesn't corrupt me!
Because I practice Dark Magic, of course! It's called that because it can make the user do dark and evil things, but since I'm so good-natured it doesn't do that to me!
I just think the outfit is cute, but I do put on performances for an audience from time to time! Crowds love watching an entertaining duel!
Monster is just a catch-all term for Duel Monsters. A lot of Monsters are cute, some are even cuddly.
It's just a term for any person or creature that exists in Duel Monsters. If you were made into a card, you would be called a Monster too.
Status? I have a lot of fans, but I'm not a noble or anything like that. I'm just the apprentice to a very powerful mage, and of course I'm pretty strong too.
Tell me about it. I made one public appearance and it drew a huge crowd that was all cheering for me! Even so, I bet someone as pretty as you is popular anytime, right?
Correct! I don't see what's wrong with my outfit though. I have the big pointy hat and everything!
There are several others! There are the Berry, Lemon, Apple, Chocolate, and Kiwi Magician Girls! And then there's my master, the original Dark Magician who I learned everything from!
Mari, I think you'll be very happy in the next few moments. I always aim to please.

condition.saying: anything I can give you a hand with

case.state: Think you could spare more than one, Robin?
Didn't like magicians, huh? That's odd. Well, what did you enjoy on your birthdays?
Aww. All gone.
Oh, OK. Just give me a few seconds.
Tough break! This heat's really getting to me.
Again? Don't expect another exciting reveal anytime soon!
I need to strip my top. Oh, but I can't reach the strings. How about you untie them for me, ~player~?
Ouch! That one stung like a jellyfish!
Aww! I'm almost out of layers, aren't I?
Am I having bad luck today or am I just bad at this game?
Thousands of years of Dueling experience doesn't translate well to strip poker, huh?
Having 2000 ATK only matters when someone plays my card. It doesn't help me at all in strip poker.
There goes my perfect win.
Aww, come on, everyone. Didn't you want to keep seeing me win?
Don't get too excited, everyone! I don't plan on doing this very often!
Guess I couldn't keep winning forever.
Aww... I was hoping to keep winning a little longer.
Again, huh? Oh well, I can deal with it!
Oh! This might set me back a bit, but I'll still win!
At least I'm still on top!
My luck couldn't hold out forever...
At least I'm still ahead... but for how long?
Aww... I lost?
There goes my comfortable lead.
Okay, I lost. I can accept that because I'm still winning!
Guess it's time I finally joined the club.
At least I'm not the first to do this...
I can't afford any more mistakes!
I can deal with this! I just have to try harder!
I know! It just matches my hair and eye colors so well!
It's nice to meet you too, Asuna! Let's do our best!
Oh, thank you! I guess taking my hat off won't be so bad!
Yes, I do!
Yes, Marinette. And you look pretty when you're nervous like that.
I think I've started losing some of that enthusiasm.
Thanks, but the enthusiasm is starting to go down.
Wow... Hopefully my next hand will be way better!
It'll take more than this to destroy me!
Hmm... I need to try a different strategy if I'm going to win.
Oh well. You win some, you lose some.
I'll get it next time. I might need to use an Equip card though.
Do you all really want to see me take off my clothes? My colorful, frilly, style-defining clothes?
Ouch! I can't take many more losses!
I lost, but I can still recover!
*sigh* Why can't I get better cards?
I'll get you back for this one!
I think I'm in desperate need of an Equip Spell!
I guess I shouldn't be so surprised.
I play... I play... There has to be a Spell Card that lets me undo this!
Things aren't going my way, are they?
Oh no, not good. I'm already down to my last pieces!
Wow, this game is tough!
Whatever happened to "third time's the charm?"
How is this even possible? Who's cheating?
Aww, give me a break!
Argh! Where's the book on getting good at strip poker?
Aww...a bricked hand right off the bat...
What? Impossible! I've been around since the time of Pharaohs! Someone with my experience should never go down first!
You mean... I already lost?
And here I thought I'd be good at this game! I mean I do have years of experience, being an immortal spirit and all.
I can't believe I lost first!
This won't do at all. If I don't get it together I'll be naked before I know it!
I may be first, but I won't be last!
Not again...
Really? So soon?
At this rate I'll be naked in no time!
Am I really this bad?
Why can't I get one decent hand?
This can't be real! Is this some trick? An illusion?!
This just isn't my night.
I lost... again...
How can my luck be this bad?
Is someone using magic? A curse, maybe?
Are you kidding me?! When will I catch a break?!
I'm not mad that I have to strip. I'm mad that I'm doing so poorly at an adults' card game!
I can't believe I'm doing this bad!
If I take off 2 other pieces can I have my lucky necklace back? I think I'm going to need it.
Must be nice to not be in last place...
I hope nobody starts making fun of my card playing. I'm usually pretty good at card games.
Please don't stare at me like that! I'm not usually this bad at games!
Oh no... Please don't tell anyone about this. If all the other spellcasters hear about this, I'll become a laughing stock!
It's just not my night...
Aww...I need to...how did Jaden say it? Oh yeah! Get my game on!
Are these cards cursed?!
I can't believe I'm losing this badly!
Does anyone want a do-over for that round?
Can I call a mulligan?
No, our stones are made through alchemy. I don't know what goes into making them. I never was very good at that stuff. "Mix this, don't mix that." It was all so boring!
If you're still wondering how a card came to life, I'm a Duel Spirit. Every Monster card in Duel Monsters has a Spirit that lives in the Duel Monsters Spirit World.
I come from the Duel Monsters Spirit World. Every monster in the game has a spirit, and sometimes we can manifest in the human world.
Hey! That's rude! I'm just having some bad luck is all!
Do I look happy to you right now?
Do I look happy to you right now?
Do I look happy to you right now?
I don't get your logic at all!
The only thing I'm wondering is if smoke's going to come out of that hole too.
I don't even like doing that with women, but if I did you'd still be the last person I'd want!
Get over yourself. I wasn't even looking at you anyway!
You're disgusting!
You won't find your answer down there, Sayla!
Society of Light? You mean when everyone including you was brainwashed?
Well, I don't really have a conventional name. I was the Ka of an Egyptian priestess, and Dark Magician Girl is what I've always been called.
Trust me, I have it perfectly under control. The only people I would want to hurt anyway are the kinds of people who deserve it, like someone trying to steal souls.
Don't worry about it. Someone would have to be really evil to make me lose control, and even then I would be completely focused on hurting them.

Speaking of which...
Anyway, by your coat I'm guessing you're some kind of scientist, right?
Sometimes this shirt likes to cling to me. Maybe you'd like to cling to me too.
Yeah, the hat isa signature part of the Magician look, but...
What was wrong with him? Was he some kind of bad guy?
You know what, Pit? Just because you're cute, I'm going to let you have that one.
~blank~
Oh well! At least it's an easy piece to strip!
Do you think we could play frisbee with this hat?
As promised, one Bikini Magician Girl coming right up!

Look, Ma! No hands!
Actually, I don't think I technically have a mom.
Dark shades on Dark Magician Girl. There's a joke in there somewhere but I can't come up with one.
It may not look like much, but this necklace helps me hold extra reserves of magical power.
Don't think I'm giving up yet!
If you're still wondering how a card came to life, I'm a Duel Spirit. Every Monster card in Duel Monsters has a Spirit that lives in the Duel Monsters Spirit World.
I come from the Duel Monsters Spirit World. Every monster in the game has a spirit, and sometimes we can manifest in the human world.
I'm the apprentice to Dark Magician. I think he could loosen up a little, but when we're together, there's nothing we can't do!
Dark Magician is my master. He taught me everything I know, and together we're an unstoppable team!
My hat's off to you all!
There's a special history to this hat, but that's a story for later.
This is my lucky pendant. I hope things don't get worse from here.
Here's my necklace. It's not much, but it does mean a lot to me!
This pendant is supposed to be lucky, but I guess I can't rely on luck anymore.
